Parameters: WebView: the WebView that owns the picture
Picture: the new picture. Applications targeting @B_android#os#Build#VERSION_CODES#JELLY_BEAN_MR2_E@ or above will always receive a null Picture. This value may be null.
onNewPicture(android.webkit.WebView,andr.Description: Deprecated due to internal changes. Used to provide notification that the WebView's picture has changed. See @B_android#webkit#WebView#capturePicture_E@ for details of the picture.
onNewPicture(android.webkit.WebView,andr.history: Added in API level 1 Deprecated in API level 12
onNewPicture(android.webkit.WebView,andr.FullName: public abstract void onNewPicture (WebView view, Picture picture)

ClassDesc: This interface is now obsolete. Interface to listen for new pictures as they change.
